entry.title: new fork of poliastro
entry.summary:
Dear community,

when looking at recent RM-bugs to remove Debian packages from the archive, I saw the removal request for poliastro. I became curious and didn't want to see this software go.

So I really hope to be able to revive this project again under the name boinor = BOdies IN â€¦
entry.content:
Dear community,

when looking at recent RM-bugs to remove Debian packages from the archive, I saw the removal request for poliastro. I became curious and didn't want to see this software go.

So I really hope to be able to revive this project again under the name boinor = BOdies IN ORbit.
